name: Diary of Sedah
description:
THE GAME RUNS BETTER IN FIREFOX. PLEASE, IF THE GAME RUNS LAGGY IN YOUR BROWSER, CONSIDER DOWNLOADING THE BINARIES :)

You have been sent by your people to contact the Kulka, a wizard responsible to maintain the balance of the world. For that, you will have to explore an underground temple, going deeper and deeper through its multiple levels.

Tools used:

* Engine: Godot

* Sampler: LMMS, Hydrogen

* Art: Aseprite

* Normal Maps: Laigter
